# 2.0.0-alpha.1 (2020-12-01)

# Bug Fixes

  • cli: close file watchers before restart (2b10108open in new window)
  • cli: delete cache before load config.ts (6739f93open in new window)
  • cli: exit process on error (f345cd6open in new window)
  • cli: ignore initial watch and avoid extra watchers (3afe1f9open in new window)
  • cli: remove extra app init and prepare (6681b0bopen in new window)

# Features

  • cli: add --cache and --clean-cache options (7ebd75bopen in new window)
  • cli: base cli functions (9b7e005open in new window)
  • cli: use user config as a plugin (1fa191fopen in new window)
  • cli: watch pages and config in dev command (96d89d9open in new window)
